website_summaries.verdict: Toy collectors and fans of “Star Wars: A New Hope” will get a kick out of collecting these cute and inexpensive Jawa, Ponda Baba, and Han Solo bobbleheads.
pros: Many Star Wars favorites like Chewbacca, C-3PO, and Greedo
cons: Toys like Darth Vader and Hammerhead are extra-hard to find

customer_reviews.title: No choice of which character you will get
customer_reviews.text: Didn't realize this would only come with one figure and it would be a mystery. Guess I didn't understand. I kind of like to know what it is I'm buying. Oh well. My son still liked his 3-CP0. (Glad it wasn't Kylo)
customer_reviews.author: GA Homeschoolers

customer_reviews.title: These ARE the figures you're looking for
customer_reviews.text: I might be a little biased because all of the figures I received are good characters and the only repeats (2) are Storm Troopers, and you can never have too many of those. So far I have Obi-Wan, Luke, Leia, Chewie, and two Storm Troopers and am pleased with the quality of each. I look forward to getting more.
customer_reviews.author: arieliondotcom

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these blind boxes. I got him two for Christmas and he was happy to get two different characters. I was afraid that he'd get the same. My daughters do the blind boxes all the time with their toys and receive multiples all the time. Anyway I would recommend these to any Star Wars fan. They are a great addition to any collection.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: No where in the description does it say this is a bobblehead. You have to look close to picture and blow it up to see it says that. I opened mine anyway and whatever character I received, I don't recognize it, it's head was turned almost all the way around. I tried to turn it back but all that did was stretch the spring of course. My fault on that but it should have been facing the right way and it should be clear in the description it is a bobblehead not a regular figurine.
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: It is a deception!
customer_reviews.text: The presentation of the product is deceptive. I bought it because I thought it was the various action figures that appear in the image. However, upon receiving the product only a single figure arrived. I bought it in the frenzy of giving a gift that a niece would surely like, but now I feel cheated and unable to give it to her with joy.
customer_reviews.author: Gustavo Araya

customer_reviews.title: Not cool. I bought this because it was supposed to ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! What a joke. The package had already been opened and then obviously the box had been reglued. The black bag on the inside has the finger stretch marks that happens when you first open one of those types of bags and was completely open when I opened the box. Not cool. I bought this because it was supposed to be a mystery figure but someone had opened it and didn't want/need it so they boxed it back up and sold it for full price. NOT COOL!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Justin22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect as gift or for any collection
customer_reviews.text: Even though the figures are random, I've been happy with what I've received so far. The figures are adorable and great as a gift or for any collection
customer_reviews.author: Chelleq

customer_reviews.title: Fun and surprises
customer_reviews.text: The little Star Wars fan loved these little mini, well constructed figures.
customer_reviews.author: JSW

customer_reviews.title: I never buy any more this product
customer_reviews.text: Sorry I disappoint your Picture Show all when I Open was Only One ... plus is to small
customer_reviews.author: HUMBERTO A HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: Hmmmm
customer_reviews.text: I strongly suspect this is someone trying to get rid of figures they don't like. I ordered two and they were duplicates... I'm not saying that never happens, but... Come on.
customer_reviews.author: J Willette

customer_reviews.title: The figurine's head is a bit skewed, but not ...
customer_reviews.text: thank you for fast shipping. The figurine's head is a bit skewed,but not problem for me.
customer_reviews.author: Özgür

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Every single blind box character is awesome. And the bobble-head mechanism is not as cheap as expected.
customer_reviews.author: E Jones

customer_reviews.title: Great little gift for them to put around their computers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a coworker. Great little gift for them to put around their computers.
customer_reviews.author: Joel R White

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My son collects these and was very happy got Princess Leia
customer_reviews.author: Jellydonut

customer_reviews.title: Meh, low quality
customer_reviews.text: They look fine but they don't bobble well and feel cheaper than other lines of mystery minis.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and fun
customer_reviews.text: Given as a gift. Recipient was overjoyed to receive them and keeps the little figures under his monitor at work where he can see them.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Smith

customer_reviews.title: Star wars mystery mini
customer_reviews.text: I got Vader on my first box and Leia on the second. I was pretty excited, and still got two more coming in.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Recieved a totally different serires of Star Wars Figues.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the series one for my husband and the one that he received was from series 8.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF
customer_reviews.text: Ad was not clear as to how many you were getting. It appeared that you were getting all of them, so I figured they would be small. Well, they were small, and you got one of them.
customer_reviews.author: L J

customer_reviews.title: Quality was not the usually norm as other mini’s
customer_reviews.text: The detail and the design of these characters are somewhat lacking compared to other mini’ I plan to skip the rest of this series
customer_reviews.author: jsterling

customer_reviews.title: "Never tell me the odds!"
customer_reviews.text: We received our mystery pack and inside was a blue and white clad rogue! Brandishing his blaster and ready to shoot Greedo. Absolutely loved this one!
customer_reviews.author: Emily

product_meta.title: Funko Mystery Mini Star Wars One Mystery Figure Action Figure,3 inches
product_meta.description: Your favorite characters from Star Wars, as stylized vinyl Mystery Minis from Funko! Figures stand 3 inches and comes in a mystery blind box. Check out the other Star Wars figures from Funko! Collect them all!.
feature_bullets: Your favorite characters from Star Wars, as stylized vinyl Mystery Minis from Funko!
Stylized collectables stand 3 inches tall, perfect for any Star Wars fan!
Collect and display all Star Wars Mystery Minis!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars172 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
